pullRequest.title: Issue #7758: Update AbstractChecks to log DetailAST - PackageDeclaration
pullRequest.bodyText:
fixes: #7758
This check partially supports Xpath.
Two log calls:

  
    
      checkstyle/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/coding/PackageDeclarationCheck.java
    
    
         Line 147
      in
      676dc23
    
    
    
    

        
          
           log(lineNumber, MSG_KEY_MISSING); 
        
    
  



  
    
      checkstyle/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/coding/PackageDeclarationCheck.java
    
    
         Line 163
      in
      676dc23
    
    
    
    

        
          
           log(fullIdent.getLineNo(), MSG_KEY_MISMATCH, packageName); 
        
    
  


Due to certain reason(#7758 (comment)), I had to provide one more log call when AST is null.
Diff report: https://dxtkastb.github.io/checkstyle/reports/packed/diff2/index.html
Changes in Documentation:
Under Check documentation:


Under Filter Documentation:

afterCommit.message: Issue #7758: Update AbstractChecks to log DetailAST - PackageDeclaration

nodes.bodyText: maybe it's worth keeping this in the code for the comment explaining it?

it looks like this can lead to an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException on empty files - is that a concern?

https://dxtkastb.github.io/checkstyle/reports/packed/diff/hibernate-orm/index.html#A19
https://dxtkastb.github.io/checkstyle/reports/packed/diff/openjdk9/index.html#A38033

nodes.bodyText: Why does test2 come before test1? Please swap their order.
Indentation looks wrong compared to other test.
@romani ping. It seems to me we need to document this that the check isn't fully xpath compliant.

nodes.bodyText:
each non-compiled file should have comment like

  
    
      checkstyle/src/it/resources-noncompilable/org/checkstyle/suppressionxpathfilter/packageannotation/SuppressionXpathRegressionPackageAnnotationOne.java
    
    
         Line 1
      in
      513ebd4
    
    
    
    

        
          
           //non-compiled with javac: non-compilable, compiling on jdk before 8 
        
    
  

 to explain a reason.
Please do the same for other Input too.
